ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We would like to thank everyone who have ­contributed to this study with financial support from the agencies CAPES (Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior, Brazil), Finance Code 001 and FAPEMIG (Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de Minas Gerais, Brazil) for funding the Master’s project. CAPES research grant to the authors Marcelo, N.A. and Pró-Reitoria de Pesquisa of UFMG (PRPq/UFMG).
